Html: Hi, GMap Net Control looks good indeed. Love to get started but there was absolutely NO sample code in my download and there doesn't seem to be any here either. How to get started. Anyone any samples, tutorials etc.? Be a great help. Thanks TS

Thanks, brilliant:  After having a look, took only a couple of hours to have a fully functional map plotting Rhumb Line, Great Circle and Composite Great Circle Voyage tracks within my VB application.

ToolTips: Is it possible to have 'multi line' toottip text? What is newline character if any? How to change Font size, weight etc?

Possible to display a graticule, a grid of Parallels of Latitude and Meridians?

Many thanks

TS

Environment.NewLine, and Font property ;}

It's possible to display a grid of parallels, but you need to draw it yourself ;}
